item.description: An application for managing Outline VPN servers

item.title: Spacetime

item.title: Knigopis
item.description: Keep list of books you've read. Have you ever read Balzac?

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Vadik, I am 32 years old Android Developer. Work 2021—now, Personal Projects Working on Android Apps and Telegram Bots 2016—2021, Tinkoff Bank 2020—2021, Lead Android Developer 2018—2020, Senior Android Developer 2016—2018, Android Developer 2011—2015, NetCracker Corp. Java Developer Study 2012—2014, Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology (MIPT) M.Sc. Telecommunication Networks and Systems 2008—2012, Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology (MIPT) B.Sc. Applied Mathematics and Physics Certifications 2020, HackerRank Problem Solving (Basic) Certificate

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Knigopis application uses no third-party analytics or advertising frameworks. Knigopis logs no information on you and has no interest in doing such. Knigopis does not collect, transmit, distribute or sell your data.
